snippet: The limited-edition “Flame Grilled” fragrance, which will only be sold in Japan on April 1, comes with a hamburger, and will cost about 5,000 yen (about $40).
abstract: Burger King says it will sell 'Flame Grilled' fragrance only on April 1 and only in Japan at cost of around 5,000 yen, or $40.
lead_paragraph: The limited-edition “Flame Grilled” fragrance, which will only be sold in Japan on April 1, comes with a hamburger, and will cost about 5,000 yen (about $40).

headline.main: Burger King to Offer Fragrance, Eau De Whopper
headline.print_headline: Burger King to Offer Fragrance, Eau de Whopper
